hopobject.name: freedombone
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2224.3 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body: Freedombone can be installed onto the Beaglebone Black, or any system running Debian Jessie, and provides encrypted email and web services such as Red Matrix, GNU Social, Dokuwiki, blogging, Owncloud, encrypted IRC, XMPP, DLNA, distributed encrypted backups and more. Freedombone utilises the Beaglebone's hardware random number generator and crypto settings recommended by bettercrypto.org. It's also 100% free software and fully security auditable.
hopobject.shortdesc: Want to give up Gmail, Facebook, Dropbox and other web services which spy on you, censor you or claim ownership of your content? Freedombone is a home internet server configuration for the BeagleBone Black.
